title: Properties of Functions
text: A function a is odd if $$a(-x)=-a(x)$$, for all $$x$$ in the domain of a.
speech: A function a is odd if  a negative x, is equal to, negative a of x, , for all  x  in the domain of a.
pacedSpeech: A function a is odd if   a negative x, is equal to, negative a of x,
